description: I've known Lily for years and it's always a treat when she comes and shoots for me. We have a deep connection because we both love to play together and this hard. There is a chemistry that is clear and that's the reason her shoots are so fucking hot!! We have her in wooden stocks, a suspension with leather and chains, a brutal back bend, and in a straight jacket getting manhandled. She is terrorized with extreme torment and made to have mind blowing orgasms.
title: Filling The Void
